20 /*
21 Function that returns the closest point on the path which is closest to the current robot position
22 Returns: Coordinates in world of the closest point on path
23 Arguments:
24 robot_pose: Pose of the robot
25 plan_index: Pointer that stores the index of the path
26 distance_to_path: Pointer that stores the actual distance to path
27 */
28 geometry_msgs::Point LocalPlanner::closestPointOnPath(tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose, int *plan_index, float *distance_to_path)//geometry_msgs::Point robot_loc)
29 {
30  geometry_msgs::Point closest_point;
31  float dx,dy,dist,shortest_dist;
32  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
33 
34  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_world_pose;
35 
36  tf_.waitForTransform("/map", robot_base_frame_, now, ros::Duration(0.2));
37  tf_.transformPose("/map", robot_pose, robot_world_pose);
38 
39  //std::cout << "Robot position... " << "Robot frame: " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getY() << " Map frame: " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getY() << endl;
40 
41  for(int i = 0; i < global_plan_temp.size(); i++)
42  {
43  dx = global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.x-robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getX();
44  dy = global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.y-robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getY();
45  //std::cout << "Robot position: " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getY();
46  //std::cout << " Global plan position: " << global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.x << " " << global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.y << endl;
47  dist = std::sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
48  //std::cout << "Iterator it = " << i << endl;
49  if(i==0 || dist <= shortest_dist)
50  {
51  //std::cout << "TransformGlobalPlan 0: " << global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.x << " " << global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.y << endl;
52  closest_point.x = global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.x;
53  closest_point.y = global_plan_temp[i].pose.position.y;
54  closest_point.z = 0;
55  shortest_dist = dist;
56  *distance_to_path = dist; // Store the shortest distance
57  *plan_index = i; // Store what index in the path that is closest
58  }
59  }
60  return closest_point;
61 }

63 /*
64 Function that returns the heading of the path at the closest distance to the robot.
65 Returns: A unit vector
66 Arguments:
67 plan_index: The index of the path to start looking at
68 */
69 tf::Vector3 LocalPlanner::unitVectorOfPath(int plan_index)
70 {
71  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped second_point, first_point;
72  tf::Vector3 vector_heading;
73  float x_value, y_value;
74  pair<float,float> vector_value;
75  //std::cout << "Global_plan_temp size: " << global_plan_temp.size() << " Plan index: " << plan_index << endl;
76  first_point = global_plan_temp[plan_index];
77  //std::cout << "unit_vector1" << endl;
78  if(global_plan_temp.size() == (plan_index + 1))
79  {
80  vector_heading.setValue(0, 0, 0);
81  }
82  else if(global_plan_temp.size() <= (plan_index + 5))
83  {
84  second_point = global_plan_temp[plan_index+1];
85  x_value = second_point.pose.position.x - first_point.pose.position.x;
86  y_value = second_point.pose.position.y - first_point.pose.position.y;
87  vector_heading.setValue(x_value, y_value, 0);
88  vector_heading.normalize();
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  second_point = global_plan_temp[plan_index+5];
93  x_value = second_point.pose.position.x - first_point.pose.position.x;
94  y_value = second_point.pose.position.y - first_point.pose.position.y;
95  vector_heading.setValue(x_value, y_value, 0);
96  vector_heading.normalize();
97  }
98  return vector_heading;
99 }

101 /*
102 Function that calculates the vector part of the attractive field part
103 Arguments:
104 ai (Starting point of a line segment)
105 robot_pose (The robot's pose)
106 unit_vector_ni (Vector from the start of a line segment towards the next point)
107 attractive_vector (Vector to return via a pointer)
108 */
109 void LocalPlanner::fAttractiveVector(geometry_msgs::Point fa_point_path, tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose, tf::Vector3 unit_vector_ni, tf::Vector3 *attractive_vector)
110 {
111  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_world_pose;
112  tf_.transformPose("/map", robot_pose, robot_world_pose);
113  //tf_.waitForTransform("/map", robot_pose, robot_world_pose);
114 
115  tf::Vector3 robot_position(robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getX(), robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getY(), 0);
116  //std::cout << "Robot pose : " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_world_pose.getOrigin().getY() << endl;
117  tf::Vector3 ai(fa_point_path.x ,fa_point_path.y, 0);
118  //std::cout << "ai : " << ai.m_floats[0] << " " << ai.m_floats[1] << " " << ai.m_floats[2] << endl;
119  tf::Vector3 ai_p = ai.operator-=(robot_position);
120  //std::cout << "ai-p : " << ai_p.m_floats[0] << " " << ai_p.m_floats[1] << " " << ai_p.m_floats[2] << endl;
121  tfScalar attractive_scalar = ai_p.dot(unit_vector_ni);
122  //std::cout << "attractive scalar : " << attractive_scalar << endl;
123  *attractive_vector = ai_p.operator-=(unit_vector_ni.operator*=(attractive_scalar));
124  //std::cout << "Attractive middle part: " << attractive_vector->m_floats[0] << " " << attractive_vector->m_floats[1] << " " << attractive_vector->m_floats[2] << endl;
125  attractive_vector->normalize();
126  //std::cout << "Attractive middle part normalized: " << attractive_vector->m_floats[0] << " " << attractive_vector->m_floats[1] << " " << attractive_vector->m_floats[2] << endl;
127  if(isnan(attractive_vector->m_floats[0]))
128  {
129  attractive_vector->setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
130  }
131 }
132 
133 /*
134 Function that calculates the repulsive vector of an static obstacle
135 */
136 void LocalPlanner::repulsiveForce(tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose, tf::Vector3 *repulsive_vector)
137 {
138  // Robot size has a radius of 0.2m in simulation with center at middle.
139  // In the paper, dmax = 1.25, radius = 0.5m, resolution = 0.1
140  // dmax = 1 + radius / 2
141  // If radius = 0.2, gives dmax = 1+0.2/2 = 1.1;
142  // Every
143  int xt, yt, cost, force_x, force_y, deg;
144  int scale = 1; // default 100
145  int gain = 106; // 71 = 1meter // 2000 // Default 10000
146  float dmax = 21; // default 1.25 // 1.1
147  float repulsive_force, x_force, y_force, z_force;
148 
149  makeRepulsiveField(scale, gain, dmax, robot_pose.getOrigin().getX(), robot_pose.getOrigin().getY(), &repulsive_force, &deg);
150 
151  if (repulsive_force > 0)
152  {
153  y_force = repulsive_force*sin(deg*PI/180);
154  x_force = repulsive_force*cos(deg*PI/180);
155  z_force = 0;
156  repulsive_vector->setValue(x_force,y_force,z_force);
157  }
158  else // If there is no repulsive force affecting the robot
159  {
160  repulsive_vector->setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
161  }
162 }
163 
164 /*
165 Function that calculates the repulsive force affecting the robot
166 */
167 void LocalPlanner::makeRepulsiveField(int scale, int gain, float dmax, float pos_x, float pos_y, float *repulsive_force, int *deg)
168 {
169  float d, d0, d2;
170  d0 = 1.0/dmax;
171  float distance_to_obstacle;
172  findClosestObjectEuclidean(deg, &distance_to_obstacle);
173  d = distance_to_obstacle * costmap_->getResolution() * 10; // Convert distance to decimeters
174  if (d < 3)
175  d = 3;
176  d2 = d / scale + 1;
177  d = (1 / d2 - d0);
178  d = d*d;
179 
180  if (d2 <= dmax) // If the robot is close enough to an obstacle to make that obstacle influence with the flow field
181  *repulsive_force = gain*d;
182  else
183  *repulsive_force = 0;
184 }
185 
186 /*
187 Function that looks in the local costmap to provide the distance and degree to the closest obstacle
188 */
189 void LocalPlanner::findClosestObjectEuclidean(int *deg, float *distance_to_obstacle)
190 {
191  float min_dist = 2000.0;
192  float current_dist = 0;
193 
194  int current_point = 0;
195 
196  int min_x = 0;
197  int min_y = 0;
198 
199  int dist_x = 0;
200  int dist_y = 0;
201 
202  unsigned int coordx = 0,coordy = 0;
203  int deg_moving_obstacle = 100;
204 
205  int pos_x = costmap_->getSizeInCellsX() / 2; // Center of the costmap (Robot's position)
206  int pos_y = costmap_->getSizeInCellsY() / 2;
207 
208  for (int h = 0; h < costmap_->getSizeInCellsY(); h++) { // Height of costmap
209  for (int w = 0; w < costmap_->getSizeInCellsX(); w++) { // Width of costmap
210  if (int(costmap_->getCost(w,h)) == costmap_2d::LETHAL_OBSTACLE) // If the position (w,h) is an obstacle
211  {
212  current_dist = std::sqrt(pow((pos_x - w),2) + pow((pos_y - h),2));
213  //costmap_->worldToMap(obstacle_vector_.xposition,obstacle_vector_.yposition,coordx,coordy);
214 
215  //if ((std::sqrt(pow((coordx - w),2) + pow((coordy - h),2))*costmap_->getResolution()) > 2.0)
216  //{
217  //if (fabs(int(round(atan2(pos_y-h, pos_x-w) * 180 / PI)) - int(round(atan2(coordy, coordx) * 180 / PI))) > 30)
218  // Update shortest distance
219  if (current_dist < min_dist) {
220  min_y = h;
221  min_x = w;
222  min_dist = current_dist;
223  }
224  //}
225  /*else
226  {
227  std::cout << "Skipped obstacle at position: " << coordx << " " << coordy << " Obstacle position at: " << w << " " << h << endl;
228  std::cout << "Distance between points is: " << std::sqrt(pow((coordx - w),2) + pow((coordy - h),2))*costmap_->getResolution() << endl;
229  }*/
230 
231  }
232  }
233  }
234 
235  //std::cout << "Added obstacle at position: " << min_x << " " << min_y << endl;
236  min_dist = fabs(min_dist - 1); // Makes the grid next to an obstacle to have a distance of 0 to an obstacle
237  dist_x = round(pos_x - min_x);
238  dist_y = round(pos_y - min_y);
239 
240  // Calculate angle
241  *deg = int(round(atan2(dist_y, dist_x) * 180 / PI));
242 
243  *distance_to_obstacle = min_dist;
244  shortest_distance_to_obstacle_ = min_dist;
245 }
246 
247 /*
248 Function that calculates the linear and angular velocity for the robot.
249 */
250 void LocalPlanner::updateVelocity(tf::Vector3 force, tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose, float *linear_velocity, float *angular_velocity, double repulsive_field_magnitude, double dipole_field_magnitude, float distance_to_path)
251 {
252  float u, omega, theta_d;
253  //float k_omega = k2;
254  float k_omega;
255  //float k_u = k1;
256  float k_u;
257  double repulsive_field_gradient = repulsive_field_magnitude - last_repulsive_field_magnitude_; // Does the magnitude increase or decrease
258  //std::cout << "Repulsive field gradient: " << repulsive_field_gradient << endl;
259  //if (fabs(repulsive_field_gradient) < 0.01)
260  // repulsive_field_gradient = 0.0;
261  float pos_x = robot_pose.getOrigin().getX();
262  float pos_y = robot_pose.getOrigin().getY();
263 
264  float theta = tf::getYaw(robot_pose.getRotation()); // Robot's heading
265 
266  float goal_x = global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX();
267  float goal_y = global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY();
268  float d = (pos_x - goal_x)*(pos_x - goal_x) + (pos_y - goal_y)*(pos_y - goal_y); d = sqrt(d); // Distance to goal
269 
270  double delta_orient = base_local_planner::getGoalOrientationAngleDifference (robot_pose, tf::getYaw(global_goal_odom.getRotation())); // Difference in rotation between robot and goal
271 
272  // Parameters that affects the attractive field
273  k1 = 0.01+tanh(1/d); // The higher k1 value, the more the robot wants to stay on the path
274  k2 = tanh(d)+tanh(repulsive_field_magnitude*1); // The higher k2 values, the more the robot wants to advance towards goal
275 
276  k_u = k1;
277  k_omega = k2;
278 
279  theta_d = atan2(force.m_floats[1], force.m_floats[0]); // Desired heading
280 
281  omega = k_omega*atan2(sin(theta_d-theta),cos(theta_d-theta)); // Angular velocity to get on path
282 
283  //u = k_u*tanh(0.1*d)*tanh(1/repulsive_field_magnitude)*tanh(1/dipole_field_magnitude)*tanh(1/(distance_to_path*4));
284  //u = k_u*tanh(0.1*d)*tanh(1/(distance_to_path*2))*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*0.5))*tanh(1/(fabs(omega*2)+1));//*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*2)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal and the repulsive field
285 
286  if (omega > MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
287  omega = MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
288  else if (omega < -MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
289  omega = -MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
290 
291 
292 
293  if(!close_to_goal)
294  {
295  if(dipole_field_magnitude < DIPOLE_FIELD_THRESHOLD) // If we do not care about the dipole field
296  {
297  if(repulsive_field_gradient>0) // If we're reaching towards an obstacle
298  {
299  u = MAX_LINEAR_VEL*tanh(0.5*d)*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*1))*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_gradient*10+1e-12)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal, the repulsive field, the angular velocity and the change of repulsive field
300  //u = 1*tanh(0.5*d)*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*1))*tanh(1/(fabs(omega*15)+1))*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_gradient*200+1e-12)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal, the repulsive field, the angular velocity and the change of repulsive field
301  }
302  else
303  {
304  u = MAX_LINEAR_VEL*tanh(0.5*d)*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*1));//*tanh(1/(fabs(omega*15)+1)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal, the repulsive field and the angular velocity
305  }
306  }
307  else
308  {
309  if(repulsive_field_gradient>0)
310  u = MAX_LINEAR_VEL*tanh(0.5*d)*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*0.5));//tanh(1/(repulsive_field_gradient*200+1e-12)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal and the repulsive field
311  else
312  u = MAX_LINEAR_VEL*tanh(0.5*d)*tanh(1/(repulsive_field_magnitude*1));//*tanh(1/(fabs(omega*15)+1)); // Speed is affected by: a constant, distance to goal, the repulsive field and the angular velocity
313  }
314  if ((last_linear_velocity_ + MAX_ACC_LINEAR) < u)
315  {
316  u = MAX_ACC_LINEAR + last_linear_velocity_;
317  }
318  if (u > MAX_LINEAR_VEL)
319  {
320  u = MAX_LINEAR_VEL;
321  }
322 
323  int intention_angle = -round((theta_d-theta)*180/PI);
324  if (intention_angle > 180)
325  {
326  intention_angle = intention_angle - 360;
327  }
328  else if (intention_angle < -180)
329  {
330  intention_angle = intention_angle + 360;
331  }
332  if (fabs(intention_angle) >= 90)
333  {
334  u = 0.01;
335  *linear_velocity = u;
336  }
337  else
338  {
339  if ((u < MIN_LINEAR_VEL) && u > (MIN_LINEAR_VEL/2))
340  *linear_velocity = MIN_LINEAR_VEL;
341  else if (u < MIN_LINEAR_VEL)
342  *linear_velocity = 0;
343  else
344  *linear_velocity = u;
345  }
346  *angular_velocity = omega;
347  last_linear_velocity_ = u;
348  }
349  else // If only the orientation is not good enough
350  {
351  float angular_vel_orientation = MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;//2;
352  if (last_linear_velocity_ >= 0)
353  {
354  if (delta_orient >= 0)
355  {
356  *angular_velocity = angular_vel_orientation;
357  }
358  else
359  {
360  *angular_velocity = -angular_vel_orientation;
361  }
362  *linear_velocity = 0.01;
363  }
364  else
365  {
366  if (delta_orient >= 0)
367  {
368  *angular_velocity = angular_vel_orientation;
369  }
370  else
371  {
372  *angular_velocity = -angular_vel_orientation;
373  }
374  *linear_velocity = 0.01;
375  }
376  last_linear_velocity_ = *linear_velocity;
377  //*linear_velocity = 0;
378  theta_d = tf::getYaw(global_goal_odom.getRotation()); //delta_orient;// * 180 / PI;
379  }
380  //std::cout << "Linear velocity: " << *linear_velocity << " Angular velocity: " << *angular_velocity << endl;
381  last_repulsive_field_magnitude_ = repulsive_field_magnitude;
382  int intention_angle = -round((theta_d-theta)*180/PI);
383  if (intention_angle > 180)
384  intention_angle = intention_angle - 360;
385  else if (intention_angle < -180)
386  intention_angle = intention_angle + 360;
387 
388  std_msgs::Int32 intention_to_send;
389  intention_to_send.data = intention_angle;
390  //std::cout << "Theta: " << theta << " Theta_d: " << theta_d << " Intention: " << intention_to_send.data << endl;
391  intention_pub.publish(intention_to_send);
392 }
393 
394 void LocalPlanner::dipoleForce(tf::Vector3 robot_moment, tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose, tf::Vector3 *dipole_force)
395 {
396  float mx, my, rx, ry, r2;
397  float fx = 0;
398  float fy = 0;
399  float reversed_angles = (float)(M_PI + M_PI / 4);
400 
401  float theta = tf::getYaw(robot_pose.getRotation()); // Heading of the robot
402  mx = last_linear_velocity_ * cos(theta); // Robot's velocity in x
403  my = last_linear_velocity_ * sin(theta); // Robot's velocity in y
404 
405  //Mock data
406  /*std::cout << "Test variable: " << test_variable % 4 << endl;
407  if (test_variable % 4 == 0)
408  {
409  mx = 0;
410  my = 0.4;
411  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - 0;
412  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - 3;
413  }
414  else if (test_variable % 4 == 1)
415  {
416  mx = 0.4;
417  my = 0;
418  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - 0;
419  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - 3;
420  }
421  else if (test_variable % 4 == 2)
422  {
423  mx = 0;
424  my = -0.4;
425  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - 0;
426  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - 3;
427  }
428  else if (test_variable % 4 == 3)
429  {
430  mx = -0.4;
431  my = 0;
432  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - 0;
433  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - 3;
434  }
435  test_variable ++;*/
436  /*mx = 0;
437  my = 0.4;
438  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - 0;
439  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - 2;*/
440  // -- Mock data
441 
442  // Equation 7 - Dynamic Dipole Field
443  // d^ = d / |d|
444  //std::cout << "Robot pos: " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getY();
445  //std::cout << " Obst pos: " << obstacle_vector_.xposition << " " << obstacle_vector_.yposition << endl;
446  //std::cout << "Robot vel: " << mx << " " << my;
447  //std::cout << " Obst vel:" << obstacle_vector_.xvelocity << " " << obstacle_vector_.yvelocity << endl;
448 
449  rx = obstacle_vector_.xposition - robot_pose.getOrigin().getX();
450  ry = obstacle_vector_.yposition - robot_pose.getOrigin().getY();
451  r2 = rx*rx + ry*ry + (1e-12);
452  rx /= std::sqrt(r2);
453  ry /= std::sqrt(r2);
454 
455  //(Mj * d^)Mk
456  fx += (obstacle_vector_.xvelocity*rx + obstacle_vector_.yvelocity*ry) * mx;
457  fy += (obstacle_vector_.xvelocity*rx + obstacle_vector_.yvelocity*ry) * my;
458 
459  //(Mk * d^)Mj
460  fx += (mx*rx + my*ry) * obstacle_vector_.xvelocity;
461  fy += (mx*rx + my*ry) * obstacle_vector_.yvelocity;
462 
463  //(Mj * Mk)d^
464  fx += (mx*obstacle_vector_.xvelocity + my*obstacle_vector_.yvelocity) * rx;
465  fy += (mx*obstacle_vector_.xvelocity + my*obstacle_vector_.yvelocity) * ry;
466 
467  // 5(Mj * d^)(Mk * d^)d^
468  fx -= 5*(mx*rx + my*ry) * (obstacle_vector_.xvelocity*rx + obstacle_vector_.yvelocity*ry) * rx;
469  fy -= 5*(mx*rx + my*ry) * (obstacle_vector_.xvelocity*rx + obstacle_vector_.yvelocity*ry) * ry;
470 
471  //3p/d^4g (...) Equation 8 - Scale the dipole field
472  // default: 1000 * fx / pow(r2*r2, float(GAMA));
473  fx = 1000 * fx / pow(r2*r2, float(GAMA));
474  fy = 1000 * fy / pow(r2*r2, float(GAMA));
475 
476  float sign = (fx*rx + fy*ry);
477  //if (sign > 0)
478  // dipole_force->setValue(-fx,-fy,0);
479  dipole_force->setValue(fx,fy,0);
480  //std::cout << "Original dipole force: " << dipole_force->m_floats[0] << " " << dipole_force->m_floats[1] << " " << dipole_force->m_floats[2] << endl;
481  if (sign < 0)
482  {
483  dipole_force->setValue(fx,fy,0);
484  //ROS_INFO("Sign negative, negative");
485  if (fx*rx > 0)
486  {
487  dipole_force->setValue(fx,fy,0); //-fx,fy
488  //ROS_INFO("Changed nothing");
489  }
490  else if (fy*ry > 0)
491  {
492  dipole_force->setValue(fx,fy,0);
493  //ROS_INFO("Changed fy");
494  }
495  /*if (fx*rx < 0)
496  {
497  dipole_force->setValue(fx,fy,0);
498  ROS_INFO("Sign negative, negative");
499  }
500  else
501  {
502  dipole_force->setValue(-fx,-fy,0);
503  ROS_INFO("Sign negative, positive");
504  }
505  */
506  }
507  else
508  {
509  //ROS_INFO("Sign positive");
510  //std::cout << "If negative: " << fx << " " << fy << endl;
511  dipole_force->setValue(-fx,-fy,0);
512  if (fx*rx < 0)
513  {
514  dipole_force->setValue(-fx,-fy,0);
515  //ROS_INFO("Changed fx");
516  }
517  else if (fy*ry < 0)
518  {
519  dipole_force->setValue(-fx,-fy,0);
520  //ROS_INFO("Changed fy");
521  }
522  //std::cout << "Alternative dipole force: " << fx*cos(reversed_angles)-fx*sin(reversed_angles) << " " << fy*sin(reversed_angles)+fy*cos(reversed_angles) << endl;
523  //dipole_force->setValue(fx*cos(reversed_angles)-fx*sin(reversed_angles),fx*sin(reversed_angles)+fx*cos(reversed_angles),0);
524  //dipole_force->setValue(fx*cos(reversed_angles)-fx*sin(reversed_angles),fy*sin(reversed_angles)+fy*cos(reversed_angles),0);
525  }
526 
527 
528 
529  if(isnan(dipole_force->m_floats[0]))
530  dipole_force->setValue(0,0,0);
531 
532  //std::cout << "Dipole force: " << dipole_force->m_floats[0] << " " << dipole_force->m_floats[1] << " " << dipole_force->m_floats[2] << endl;
533 }
534 
535 /*
536 Callback function that listens to the object tracking node
537 */
538 void LocalPlanner::dynamicObstacleCallback(const vector_creation::vector msg)
539 {
540  if(msg.xvelocity != 0 && msg.yvelocity != 0) // If the message is not empty
541  obstacle_vector_ = msg; // Copy to a private variable
542 }
543 
544 /*
545 Function that calculates everything that the navigation part needs
546 */
547 bool LocalPlanner::computeVelocityCommands(geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd_vel){
548 
549 
550  double trajCost,minCost,x,y,th;
551  float angular_velocity, linear_velocity;
552 
553  if(!initialized_)
554  {
555  ROS_ERROR("MDH Local_Planner has not been initialized, please call initialize() before using this planner");
556  return false;
557  }
558 
559  //ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
560  //unsigned int now.sec
561 
562  //Get where we are
563  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose;
564  costmap_ros_->getRobotPose(robot_pose);
565  int coord_x, coord_y;
566 
567  int plan_index = 0; // Will eventually hold the index belonging to the global path which is closest to the robot
568  float distance_to_path; // Will eventually hold the distance to the closest point on path
569  tf::Vector3 f_attractive_vector, f_repulsive_vector, final_vector, dipole_force, vector_to_compute, obstacle_velocity_vector;
570  global_plan_temp = global_plan_;
571  generate_new_path = 1;
572  geometry_msgs::Point fa_point_path = closestPointOnPath(robot_pose, &plan_index, &distance_to_path); // Where are we
573 
574  //ros::spinOnce(); // Receive information from callback
575 
576  repulsiveForce(robot_pose, &f_repulsive_vector);
577 
578  if (distance_to_path <= 1 || shortest_distance_to_obstacle_ <= 6.1) // Inside bounds and not too close to an obstacle
579  {
580  // Attractive vector equations
581  tf::Vector3 unit_vector_ni(unitVectorOfPath(plan_index));
582  fAttractiveVector(fa_point_path, robot_pose, unit_vector_ni, &f_attractive_vector);
583  f_attractive_vector.operator*=(1 - exp(-k1*distance_to_path));
584  f_attractive_vector.operator+=(unit_vector_ni.operator*=(k2*exp(-k1*distance_to_path)));
585 
586  dipoleForce(final_vector, robot_pose, &dipole_force);
587 
588  if (f_repulsive_vector.length() > REPULSIVE_FIELD_THRESHOLD && dipole_force.length() > DIPOLE_FIELD_THRESHOLD)
589  {
590  f_repulsive_vector.normalize();
591  f_repulsive_vector.operator*=(2);
592  dipole_force.normalize();
593  f_attractive_vector.operator/=(10);
594  }
595  else if (dipole_force.length() <= DIPOLE_FIELD_THRESHOLD)
596  dipole_force.setValue(0,0,0);
597  else
598  {
599  dipole_force.normalize();
600  dipole_force.operator*=(2);
601  }
602 
603  final_vector = f_repulsive_vector;
604  final_vector.operator+=(dipole_force);
605  final_vector.operator+=(f_attractive_vector);
606 
607  //std::cout << "Dipole force: " << dipole_force.m_floats[0] << " " << dipole_force.m_floats[1] << " " << dipole_force.m_floats[2] << endl;
608  //std::cout << "Repulsive force: " << f_repulsive_vector.m_floats[0] << " " << f_repulsive_vector.m_floats[1] << " " << f_repulsive_vector.m_floats[2] << endl;
609  //std::cout << "Final vector: " << final_vector.m_floats[0] << " " << final_vector.m_floats[1] << " " << final_vector.m_floats[2] << endl;
610 
611  /*double mapx, mapy;
612  costmap_->mapToWorld(costmap_->getSizeInCellsX()/2,costmap_->getSizeInCellsY()/2,mapx,mapy);
613  std::cout << "Middle of costmap: " << mapx << " " << mapy << endl;
614 
615  unsigned int coordx,coordy;
616  costmap_->worldToMap(global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX(),global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY(),coordx,coordy);
617  std::cout << "Cost of goal: " << (int)costmap_->getCost(coordx,coordy) << endl;*/
618  std::cout << "Robot pos: " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getX() << " " << robot_pose.getOrigin().getY() << endl;
619 
620  updateVelocity(final_vector, robot_pose, &linear_velocity, &angular_velocity, f_repulsive_vector.length(), dipole_force.length(), distance_to_path);
621  cmd_vel.angular.z = angular_velocity;
622  cmd_vel.linear.x = linear_velocity;
623  //intention_pub.publish();
624 
625  minCost = 255;//std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
626  global_plan_temp.clear();
627  }
628  else
629  {
630  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped check_if_done_ = global_plan_.back();
631  new_map_pub.publish(check_if_done_);
632  generate_new_path = 1; // Re-calculate global plan. Out of bounds
633  }
634 
635  return true;
636 }
637 
638 /*
639 Checks of the goal is reached
640 */
641 bool LocalPlanner::isGoalReached(){
642 
643  if (!goal_reached_)
644  {
645  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose;
646  costmap_ros_->getRobotPose(robot_pose); //frame_id_=odom
647 
648  //Both, global goal and robot pose are in the same coordinate system, odom.
649  double dx = global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX() - robot_pose.getOrigin().getX();
650  double dy = global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY() - robot_pose.getOrigin().getY();
651 
652  double delta_orient = base_local_planner::getGoalOrientationAngleDifference (robot_pose, tf::getYaw(global_goal_odom.getRotation()));
653 
654  unsigned int coordx = 0,coordy = 0;
655 
656  costmap_->worldToMap(global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX(),global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY(),coordx,coordy);
657 
658  //std::cout << "Goal coordinate costmap: " << coordx << " " << coordy << endl;
659  //std::cout << "Final orientation: " << tf::getYaw(global_goal_odom.getRotation()) << endl;
660  //std::cout << "Cost: " << ((int)costmap_->getCost(coordx,coordy)) << " At position: " << coordx << " " << coordy << endl;
661 
662  if (fabs(std::sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)) < 1.0)
663  {
664  if (((int)costmap_->getCost(coordx,coordy)) > 0)
665  {
666  ROS_INFO("Could not fully reach the goal. The goal is too close to an obstacle at %f %f", global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX(), global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY());
667  goal_reached_ = true;
668  close_to_goal = false;
669  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped check_if_done_;
670  check_if_done_.header.frame_id = global_frame_;
671  check_if_done_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
672  check_if_done_.pose.position.x = -2500000.0;
673  check_if_done_.pose.position.y = -2500000.0;
674  check_if_done_.pose.position.z = 0.0;
675  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
676  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
677  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
678  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
679  new_map_pub.publish(check_if_done_);
680  generate_new_path = 1;
681  return true;
682  }
683  else if (fabs(std::sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)) < 0.5 && fabs(delta_orient) < (30 * PI / 180))
684  {
685  goal_reached_ = true;
686  ROS_INFO("Goal reached close to %f %f", global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getX(), global_goal_odom.getOrigin().getY());
687  close_to_goal = false;
688  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped check_if_done_;
689  check_if_done_.header.frame_id = global_frame_;
690  check_if_done_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
691  check_if_done_.pose.position.x = -2500000.0;
692  check_if_done_.pose.position.y = -2500000.0;
693  check_if_done_.pose.position.z = 0.0;
694  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
695  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.y = 0.0;
696  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
697  check_if_done_.pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
698  new_map_pub.publish(check_if_done_);
699  generate_new_path = 1;
700  return true;
701 
702  }
703  else if (fabs(std::sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)) < 0.2) // If we only need to adjust the orientation
704  {
705  close_to_goal = true;
706  }
707  else if (fabs(std::sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)) > 0.5)
708  close_to_goal = false;
709  }
710  else
711  {
712  close_to_goal = false;
713  }
714  }
715  return goal_reached_;
716 }
717 
718 /*
719 Sets the global plan received from the global planner
720 */
721 bool LocalPlanner::setPlan(const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan){
722  if(!initialized_)
723  {
724  ROS_ERROR("Please call initialize() before using this planner");
725  return false;
726  }
727  if (plan.size() > 1)
728  {
729  std::cout << "Plan not empty " << " Size of plan: " << plan.size() << endl;
730  if(generate_new_path == 1)
731  {
732  global_plan_.clear();
733  global_plan_ = plan;
734 
735  //Get where we are
736  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> robot_pose;
737  costmap_ros_->getRobotPose(robot_pose);
738 
739 
740  tf::poseStampedMsgToTF(global_plan_.back(), global_goal);
741 
742  try{
743  tf_.transformPose(global_frame_, global_goal, global_goal_odom);
744  //tf_.waitForTransform(global_frame_, global_goal, global_goal_odom); ////transform the global goal from map to odom
745  }
746  catch (tf::TransformException ex){
747  ROS_ERROR("IsGoalReached %s",ex.what());
748  return false;
749  }
750  close_to_goal = false;
751  goal_reached_ = false;
752  generate_new_path = 0;
753  }
754  }
755 
756 
757 
758  return true;
759 }
760 
761 /*
762 Initialize Local planner
763 */
764  void LocalPlanner::initialize(std::string name, tf::TransformListener *tf, costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS *costmap_ros){
765 
766  // check if the plugin is already initialized
767  if(!initialized_)
768  {
769  // copy adress of costmap and Transform Listener (handed over from move_base)
770  costmap_ros_ = costmap_ros;
771  costmap_ = costmap_ros_->getCostmap(); // locking should be done in MoveBase.
772 
773 
774  global_frame_ = costmap_ros_->getGlobalFrameID();
775  robot_base_frame_ = costmap_ros_->getBaseFrameID();
776 
777  // create Node Handle with name of plugin (as used in move_base for loading)
778  ros::NodeHandle pn("~/" + name);
779  ros::NodeHandle path_handle;
780  ros::NodeHandle intention_node;
781 
782  // advertise topics (adapted global plan and predicted local trajectory)
783  l_plan_pub_ = pn.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("local_plan", 1);
784  marker_pub = pn.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("visualization_marker", 1);
785  shape = visualization_msgs::Marker::CUBE;
786  new_map_pub = path_handle.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/move_base_simple/goal",1);
787  intention_pub = intention_node.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/TX2_localplanner_intention",1);
788 
789 
790 
791  // Added by Peter
792  std::cout << "Local costmap: " << endl;
793  std::cout << "Resolution: " << costmap_->getResolution() << endl;
794  std::cout << "Size in cells x : " << costmap_->getSizeInCellsX() << endl;
795  std::cout << "Size in cells y : " << costmap_->getSizeInCellsY() << endl;
796  std::cout << "Origin costmap: " << costmap_->getOriginX() << " " << costmap_->getOriginY() << endl;
797  double mapx, mapy;
798  //costmap_->mapToWorld(costmap_->getOriginX(),costmap_->getOriginY(),mapx,mapy);
799  costmap_->mapToWorld(0,0,mapx,mapy);
800  std::cout << "Origin costmap world coordinates: " << mapx << " " << mapy << endl;
801  costmap_->mapToWorld(costmap_->getSizeInCellsX()/2,costmap_->getSizeInCellsY()/2,mapx,mapy);
802  std::cout << "World coordinate in middle of costmap: " << mapx << " " << mapy << endl;
803  test_variable = 0;
804  generate_new_path = 1;
805  last_linear_velocity_ = 0;
806  k1 = 0.01;
807  k2 = 1;
808  ros::NodeHandle moving_obstacle_node;
809  moving_obstacle_subscriber_ = moving_obstacle_node.subscribe<vector_creation::vector>("/TX2/vector_creation/vector", 1, &LocalPlanner::dynamicObstacleCallback, this);
810  close_to_goal = false;
811  final_vectors_vector.clear();
812  last_repulsive_field_magnitude_ = 0.0;
813  shortest_distance_to_obstacle_ = 100.0;
814  // -- Peter
815 
816 
817  // set initialized flag
818  initialized_ = true;
819 
820 
821 
822  // this is only here to make this process visible in the rxlogger right from the start
823  ROS_DEBUG("Local planner plugin initialized.");
824  }
825  else
826  {
827  ROS_WARN("This planner has already been initialized, doing nothing.");
828  }
829  }
830 
831  };
